package.name: Wicorn29 Core Framework
package.shortDescription: Wicorn29 Core Framework providing shared libraries for Wicorn29 packages.

descriptionlist.description: Wicorn29 Core Framework providing essential shared libraries and utilities for Wicorn29 packages. Features include system information commands, device model and network info retrieval, cache cleaning, and powerful system plist management tools with safe backup, restore, and modification capabilities. Designed for iOS 12 and above, this framework helps keep your tweaks stable and your device running smoothly.

Included commands: - --ios-ver: Show iOS version - --krnl-ver: Show kernel version - uptime: Show system uptime - model: Show device model - network: Show IP address - respring: Respring the device - safemode: Enter Substrate safe mode - cleancache: Clear Cydia cache - modsysps : Modify system plist key (with backup safety) - bsysps -backup: Backup system plist - bsysps -restore: Restore system plist (with diff & confirmation) - bsysps --destroy-backup: Delete system plist backup
